Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.egartley.beyondorigins.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Miscellaneous methods that don't fit into a specific class or object
    Author:
    Evan Gartley

      • resized

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage resized(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                                   int w,
                                                   int h)
        Returns a resized image of the original with the supplied width and height
        Parameters:
        image - The original image to resize (won't be changed)
        w - New width to resize to
        h - New height to resize to
        Returns:
        A resized version of the given buffered image

      • randomInt

        public static int randomInt(int maximum,
                            int minimum)
        Returns a random integer, using ThreadLocalRandom, between the supplied maximum and minimum values
        Parameters:
        maximum - The maximum value the random integer could be
        minimum - The minimum value the random integer could be
        Returns:
        A randon integer between the given maximum and minimum

      • randomInt

        public static int randomInt(int maximum,
                            int minimum,
                            boolean inclusive)

        Returns a random integer between the supplied maximum and minimum values (uses randomInt(minimum, maximum))

        If inclusive, then randomInt(minimum, maximum + 1) will be used

        Parameters:
        maximum - The maximum value the random integer could be
        minimum - The minimum value the random integer could be
        inclusive - Whether or not the include the maximum as a possible value
        Returns:
        A randon integer between the given maximum and minimum

      • getAllBoundaryCollisions

        public static java.util.ArrayList<EntityEntityCollision> getAllBoundaryCollisions(EntityEntityCollision baseEvent,
                                                                                  Entity entity,
                                                                                  EntityBoundary baseBoundary)
        Returns generated entity-to-entity collisions around the given parameters
        Parameters:
        baseEvent - The EntityEntityCollision in which to base all of the returned ones on
        entity - The Entity in which to generate collisions around each of its boundaries
        baseBoundary - The other EntityBounadry in which to base the generated collisions around
        Returns:
        Generated entity-to-entity collisions based on the given parameters
